item.title: New Marketing Data Intern
item.dc:creator: Kemi Amin
item.description:
I am very excited to introduce my new Marketing Data Intern Jennifer Cruz-Hernandez. Jennifer is a part of the first cohort of interns hired through the Library Internship Program. She will be working on visualizing Library marketing data (classes/workshops, emails, etc.) in Tableau and assisting the Data Science Initiative team ...

item.title: RECAP: Parnassus Library Entrance Redesign 2017 Staff Meeting
item.dc:creator: Kemi Amin
item.description:
In the last staff meeting of 2017, we discussed the Parnassus Library Entrance Redesign project, followed by a design charrette where we reimagined the Hearst Room. Many of you asked important questions, brought up valid concerns, and had thoughtful ideas that will be taken into consideration for this project.  Everyone who participated ...

item.title: A Conversation About Safety & Security with UCSF Police

item.description:
To continue our conversation about safety and security at the Library, we have invited the UCSF Police to a morning discussion for Library staff and building tenants.    Join us on Friday, January 19 from 10 – 11 am at the Parnassus Library staff lounge (1st floor). We will have the ...

item.description:

item.title: Parnassus Library Entrance Redesign Project
item.dc:creator: Kemi Amin
item.description:
The entrance to the Parnassus Library will undergo a redesign to provide better service and improved access to the UCSF community. Based on data pulled from the 2015 campus-wide LibQual Library Survey, the 2017 Library Spaces Survey, and Access Services reports, Chancellor Sam Hawgood and Executive Vice Chancellor and Provost Dan Lowenstein ...
